title: Himesh Reshammiya starrer Badass Ravi Kumar recovers Rs. 20 cr cost even before release - Bollywood Hungama
summary:
Himesh Reshammiya's Badass Ravi Kumar Recovers Rs. 20 Crore Before Release

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Bollywood Hungama

Himesh Reshammiya’s film, Badass Ravi Kumar, has successfully recovered its cost of Rs. 20 crore before its release, demonstrating innovative financial strategies employed by the filmmakers.

  • The film's production budget has been fully covered by music rights and subsidies from Oman.
  • The music for the film has reportedly generated Rs. 16 crore, while subsidies added another Rs. 4 crore.
  • Additively, the film's marketing cost of Rs. 4 crore is also expected to be recouped through various rights.
  • Set in the 1980s, the film channels the aesthetic of classic movies, with meticulous planning to avoid overspending.
  • Himesh Reshammiya has adopted a profit-sharing model for his role as a composer, singer, and actor.
“I am on a profit sharing deal in this film and haven’t charged for my music... we have very meticulously planned this movie for over a year so that there is no wastage at all.” - Himesh Reshammiya

With the motion poster and trailer generating strong interest, Badass Ravi Kumar is set to release on February 7.
newTitle: Himesh Reshammiya's Badass Ravi Kumar Recovers Rs. 20 Crore Before Release

title: Exclusive - Anupamaa: Rupali Ganguly reacts to reports of her quitting the show; says 'I opened the gate, - The Times of India
summary:
Rupali Ganguly Addresses Rumors of Quitting Anupamaa, Affirms Commitment to the Show

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Times of India

Rupali Ganguly responds to recent rumors regarding her departure from the popular show Anupamaa, clarifying her emotional connection and unwavering commitment to the series.

  • Rumors surfaced about a potential 15-year leap in the storyline, causing speculation about Ganguly's exit.
  • Ganguly shared a heartfelt message emphasizing that Anupamaa is her home and she will not leave the show.
  • Producers Deepa Shahi and Rajan Shahi confirmed that the rumors are false and reaffirmed the show's dedication to real emotions.
  • Ganguly encouraged fans to continue supporting the show and assured them of its continuity.
“Anupamaa is not just a show for me; it's an emotion, it's my home.” - Rupali Ganguly

With her deep connection to the show and commitment to its future, Rupali Ganguly reassures fans that Anupamaa will continue to thrive.
newTitle: Rupali Ganguly Addresses Rumors of Quitting Anupamaa, Affirms Commitment to the Show

title: Coldplay faces a legal notice ahead of their Ahmedabad concert: ‘Cannot use children in any form on the s - TOI Etimes
summary:
Coldplay Faces Legal Notice for Upcoming Ahmedabad Concert

Date: N/A Source: N/A

Coldplay's upcoming concert is under scrutiny due to concerns regarding the use of children on stage and sound levels that could harm young audiences.

  • Legal notice issued by the District Child Protection Unit to Coldplay and organizers.
  • Children are not allowed on stage or in the venue without hearing protection.
  • Sound levels must not exceed 120 decibels to protect children’s health.
  • Concern raised by Pandit Rao Dharnevar regarding potential harm to children.
  • Previous actions taken against other performers for similar concerns.
“Certain songs make uncivilized and barbaric impressions on the minds of young children.” – Pandit Rao Dharnevar

This notice highlights ongoing concerns about children's rights and safety during large public events.
newTitle: Coldplay Faces Legal Notice for Upcoming Ahmedabad Concert

title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 30: Allu Arjun Inaugurates The 800 Crore Club, Set To Create History In Week 5 By Defeating Stree 2? - Koimoi
summary:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 30: Allu Arjun Inaugurates The 800 Crore Club, Set To Create History In Week 5

Publication Date: Recent

Source: Koimoi

The Hindi-dubbed version of Pushpa 2 has reached a remarkable milestone by entering the 800 crore club within just 30 days of its release, becoming the highest-grossing Hindi film ever.

  • The film broke multiple box office records since its opening.
  • It has surpassed major competitors like Jawan and Stree 2 in earnings.
  • On its 30th day, it earned an estimated 3 crores, reaching a total of 801.20 crores at the Indian box office.
  • This achievement marks it as the first film to enter the 800 crore club with Hindi collections.
  • Pushpa 2 aims to set new records in its upcoming fifth week.
“This is a huge achievement, and it won’t be easy to enjoy such madness at the Indian box office in the coming future.”

In conclusion, Pushpa 2's success at the box office sets the stage for future milestones in similar cinematic ventures, creating a new benchmark for Indian films.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Milestone: Allu Arjun's Film Enters 800 Crore Club

summary:

title: Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone's Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani beats Laila Majnu, re-releases to ₹1.20 crore opening - Hindustan Times
summary:
Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani Re-releases with ₹1.20 Crore Opening

Date: January 04, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Ayan Mukerji's romantic comedy Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani, starring Ranbir Kapoor and Deepika Padukone, re-released in cinemas on Friday, earning ₹1.20 crore on its opening day.

  • The film sold 65,000 tickets on its reopening day.
  • It has an overall gross of ₹188.57 crore in India and ₹318 crore worldwide.
  • This re-release secured the second best opening for a re-released film.
  • It surpassed the opening numbers of other re-released films like Laila Majnu, Karan Arjun, Veer-Zaara, and Kal Ho Naa Ho.
Karan Johar stated, “Converting cinemas into rock concerts! YJHD is back in theatres!”

The film has a stellar cast and memorable music, marking a significant comeback for its lead actors.
newTitle: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani Re-releases with ₹1.20 Crore Opening

title: After more than a decade, Vishal-Sundar C film ‘Madha Gaja Raja’ gets a release date - The Hindu
summary:
After more than a decade, Vishal-Sundar C film ‘Madha Gaja Raja’ gets a release date

Published on: January 04, 2025
Source: The Hindu

After a lengthy delay, Sundar C’s Madha Gaja Raja has got a release date. Starring Vishal and Santhanam, the movie will hit the screens on January 12, 2025.

  • The film was expected to release in 2013 but faced delays due to financial and legal issues.
  • Other cast members include Anjali, Varalaxhmi Sarathkumar, Sathish, Sonu Sood, and the late Manobala.
  • The film is a comedy-drama produced by Gemini Film Circuit.
  • Vijay Antony is the music composer, with Richard M Nathan as the cinematographer.
“Madha Gaja Raja has joined the long list of Tamil releases coming out in the Pongal week.”

The film joins other anticipated releases like Vanangan, Nesippaya, Kadhalikka Neramillai, and Madraskaaran for Pongal. Ajith Kumar’s Vidaamuyarchi was postponed due to “unavoidable circumstances”.
newTitle: Vishal-Sundar C film ‘Madha Gaja Raja’ finally gets a release date after a decade

title: S Shankar says he is ‘shocked’ at Anurag Kashyap calling him ‘caterer’ for editing Ram Charan’s Game Changer like Instagram Reels - The Indian Express
summary:
S Shankar Responds to Anurag Kashyap's Comments on Game Changer

Publication Date: January 10
Source: Indian Express

Filmmaker S Shankar has expressed his shock at Anurag Kashyap's comments about his upcoming movie, Game Changer, suggesting it is edited like an Instagram Reel. Shankar clarified his stance on audience engagement and the importance of effective storytelling in cinema.

  • Shankar emphasized the need to keep audiences engaged amidst their short attention spans.
  • He clarified that his comments were misinterpreted, stating that he did not equate his film to Instagram Reels.
  • Game Changer, starring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, will be released in cinemas on January 10.
“The current generation of audiences is impatient; within 10 minutes, they will take out their phones and start commenting about the film on social media,” said Shankar.

Shankar's remarks reflect a broader concern among filmmakers about audience engagement in the digital age and highlight the tension between creative vision and audience expectations.
newTitle: S Shankar Responds to Anurag Kashyap's Comments on Game Changer

Ashneer Grover trademarks his name; Netizens say, 'Now Sony TV will have to pay royalties' - Indian Startup News
summary:
Ashneer Grover trademarks his name; Netizens say, 'Now Sony TV will have to pay royalties'

Publication Date: N/A Source: Indian Startup News

Former Shark Tank India judge Ashneer Grover has officially trademarked his name, allowing him to strengthen his brand identity and expand his commercial reach. This was confirmed by his trademark lawyer, who shared the details on LinkedIn.

Key Points

  • Ashneer Grover has trademarked his name under class 41 of the Trade Marks Act, 1999.
  • Celebrity trademarks are a complex issue in India.
  • Famous personalities like Alia Bhatt and SRK have successfully trademarked their names.
  • Netizens reacted humorously to the news, discussing implications and making jokes.

Notable Quotes

"After navigating legal landscapes, we achieved this significant milestone. This trademark not only strengthens their brand identity but also expands their commercial reach beyond entertainment." - Aditi Tuteja
"Now sony television have to pay royalties for using the name of ashneer sir and tagging him in YouTube videos for the views." - Netizen Reaction

Overall, Grover's trademark could set a precedent for celebrity branding in India, as reactions from the public highlight the evolving nature of intellectual property in entertainment.
newTitle: Ashneer Grover trademarks his name; Netizens react humorously

title: When Ranbir Kapoor confessed love for Anushka Sharma and said she 'friend zoned' him - TOI Etimes
Junaid Khan first saw parents Aamir Khan and Reena Dutta fight when he was 19, opens up about dealing with their divorce: ‘He wasn’t totally absent’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Junaid Khan first saw parents Aamir Khan and Reena Dutta fight when he was 19, opens up about dealing with their divorce: ‘He wasn’t totally absent’

Date: Not specified | Source: Indian Express

Junaid Khan, son of Bollywood superstar Aamir Khan, shares insights about growing up with divorced parents and his relationship with his family.

  • Junaid made his acting debut with Maharaj (2024).
  • Aamir Khan and Reena Dutta divorced in 2002 after 16 years of marriage.
  • Junaid did not witness any fights between his parents until he was 19.
  • He appreciates how his parents handled their divorce maturely for the benefit of their children.
  • Junaid, along with his sister Ira, maintains a close family bond, meeting regularly for family tea.
  • He noted that Aamir has evolved and spends more time with the family as he ages.
  • On the work front, Junaid will act alongside Khushi Kapoor and Sai Pallavi in upcoming projects.
“I think it was probably a mature thing to do. I mean two good people aren’t always good together.” - Junaid Khan

In conclusion, despite their divorce, Aamir and Reena have ensured a loving environment for their children, allowing them to maintain a strong familial bond.
newTitle: Junaid Khan Reflects on Parents' Divorce and His Childhood
